item.description:
By far, our most popular event - Saturday night Glow Bowling.
Glow bowling is when they turn off all the lights on one side of the building and turn on black lights, disco balls, fog machine, and crank up the music ---- disco, oldies, and today's music. Easy access from Route 128 and free parking in the lot. Join us!

$2.00 per pair of rental shoes

$11.00 min bowling cost - payable before we leave the Lanes.

MAXIMUM of 6 people to a lane
We can begin with wine and apps at Tres Monte around the corner.

Participate by organizing a future event or donate $$ to offset out of pocket meetup fees.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Back by Popular Demand- Saturday Night Glow Bowling - Part Two
